name: rolly dungeon
description:
In this game you must kill 25 enemies to complete it. You can upgrade your health by pressing cross button on the left. Also you can buy new dice slots and upgrade yours.

Developed by:

Sergey Baranov & Vladimir Mishakov

Used assets:

Font: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
Skeleton enemy: https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack

Hero sprite: https://donhellsing.itch.io/dark-knight

Mushroom: https://luizmelo.itch.io/monsters-creatures-fantasy

Wall tiles: https://raou.itch.io/free-dungeon-mini-tileset
